hero.title: AI-Powered Landing Pages in Minutes
hero.description: Generate compelling content and SEO-optimized landing pages with minimal effort. Powered by advanced AI to help you stand out.

mainFeatures.title: AI Content Generation
mainFeatures.description: Our AI generates high-quality, customized content based on your business description. Get compelling copy that resonates with your audience.

mainFeatures.title: Responsive Templates
mainFeatures.description: Choose from professionally designed, mobile-responsive templates that adapt perfectly to any screen size. Customize colors and fonts with ease.

mainFeatures.title: SEO Optimization
mainFeatures.description: Every landing page comes with built-in SEO optimization, ensuring your content ranks well in search engines and reaches your target audience.

featureDescription: Whether you're a small business owner or a large corporation, our landing page generator has everything you need to create a compelling online presence.

features.title: Multiple LLM Providers
features.description: Support for OpenAI, Google Gemini, and other LLM providers gives you flexibility in choosing your AI backend.

features.title: Blog Generation
features.description: Generate SEO-optimized blog posts automatically with our AI. Includes basic CMS functionality for easy management.

features.title: Analytics Integration
features.description: Built-in support for multiple analytics providers including Umami, Plausible, and Google Analytics.

features.title: Custom Templates
features.description: Create and save your own templates or modify existing ones to match your brand perfectly.

features.title: Version Control
features.description: Keep track of all your landing page versions and roll back changes when needed.

features.title: Fast Deployment
features.description: Deploy your landing pages instantly with integrated hosting and CDN support.

cta.title: Start Creating Today
cta.description: Generate your first AI-powered landing page in under 5 minutes. Choose a template, describe your business, and let our AI do the rest.

faqs.title: Frequently asked questions
faqs.description: If you have anything else you want to ask, reach out to us.

questions.question: How does the AI content generation work?
questions.answer: Simply describe your business or product, and our AI will generate compelling, context-aware content for your landing page. You can then edit and refine the content as needed.

pricing.title: Simple pricing for any business
pricing.description: Choose the plan that best fits your needs. All plans include core AI generation features and updates.

plans.name: Basic
plans.description: Perfect for small businesses and startups looking to establish their online presence.

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: For growing businesses that need more content and customization options.

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: For companies requiring unlimited generations and white-label options.
